review: I purchased an LCD from amazon, which is great, and they sent me a $15 coupon which i used along with the holiday pricing so I paid $64.99 for this unit which is GREAT!I already have a ROKU . This unit is worth $99 but im glad I lucked out and got it for $64.99 :)

review: All the hype that I read on a supposedly non-amazon connected review was a total disappointment. ! did not see the flash connection to the amazon video movies as stated in the review. The improved clarity of videos was not noticed by me. The amount of apps available not there unless you go looking for these one by one. I have been an avid and loyal Amazon customer for years, having bought at least 4-5 Kindle fire tablets to date. Although, I do like the interaction with the Kindle tablets, the exceptional performance  of the Fire TV was in my opinion greatly  exaggerated. Given that I have used and owned the Apple TV, Roku HD, Sonny module and a Chromecast stick, I have to give the top  performance to Roku HD. I had even disconnected my Roku to be used in one of my secondary tv but after playing with my new Kindle HD TV module. I have to revert my choice back to my Roku. Sorry Amazon, but to me, Amazon Fire TV has much to learn from the Roku module which is more interactive friendly and has nothing to envy in quick performance and clarity.
